阿尔托莉雅 Beast VI:Lust ——妖狐王
被NFF进行灵基改造，曾经的Lancer：狮子王阿尔托莉雅 ，吸收了赏玩之兽的魔力而被欲望浸染，完全变质升华成了新的Beast VI:Lust，——被称为妖狐王的大淫妇。
让我们把人理变得更快乐一点吧，新生的Beast轻抚着淫之魔剑，等待着御主的到来。

——因为那把圣剑的腐化，恐怕所有阿尔托莉雅的侧面都会以兽的形式显现吧

[ENG]

Altria Beast VI: Lust —— Fox King
After being spiritually transformed by NFF, the former Lancer: Lion King Altria absorbed the magic power of the beast of enjoyment and was soaked with desire. She completely transformed and sublimated into the new Beast VI: Lust, ——the great whore known as the Demon Fox King.
Let's make humanity a little happier, the newborn Beast caresses the demon sword of adultery, waiting for the master to arrive.

——Because of the corruption of that holy sword, I'm afraid all the sides of Altoria will appear in the form of beasts
